Rules:

16 players - 9 domestic, 7 overseas. (must have a minimum of 6 Domestic in a matchday XI)

5 players will be allocated pre-draft to each team based on historic links to that area/region

Remaining 11 players will be chosen by an open Snake Draft (NFL style but snaking) from the available players.

Southampton Braves- James Vince (Hants for almost a decade); Mason Crane (Hants player for almost a decade); Liam Dawson (Hants player since 2007); Joe Weatherley (Hants since 2015 & born in Winchester); Chris Wood (Hants since 2010& born in Basingstoke)

Tyne & Wear Chargers - Scott Borthwick (Durham & born in Sunderland); Ben Raine (born in Sunderland); Mark Wood (born in Ashington); Matt Potts (born in Sunderland); Mark Stoneman (born in Newcastle)

Nottingham Rockets - Stuart Broad (born in Nottingham); Jake Ball (born in Mansfield); Luke Fletcher (born in Nottingham); Matt Milnes (born in Nottingham); Rehan Ahmed (born in Nottingham)

South London Elite - Zak Crawley (born in Greater London [south of the river]); Dan Bell-Drummond (born in Lewisham); Ben Duckett (born in Greater London [south of the river]); Ravi Bopara (born in Greater London); Dawid Malan (born in Greater London [south of the river])

MCC Originals - Jamie Porter (born East London & former MCC young cricketer); Dan Moriarty (born in Greater London & former MCC young cricketer); Stuart Poynter (born in London & former MCC young cricketer); Andy Balbirnie (ex-Middlesex & former MCC young cricketer); Bas De Leede (former MCC young cricketer)

Manchester Spirit - Josh Bohannon (born in Bolton); James Anderson (born in Burnley); Matt & Callum Parkinson (born in Bolton); Scott McKechnie (born in Salford)

Birmingham Pheonix - Moeen Ali (born in Birmingham); Saqib Mahmood (born in Birmingham); Chris Woakes (born in Birmingham); Rob Yates (born in Solihull); Dan Mouseley (born in Birmingham)

Leeds Yorkies - Joe Root (born in Sheffield); Harry Brook (born in Keighley); Jonny Bairstow (born in Bradford); Adil Rashid (born in Bradford); Matthew Waite (born in Leeds)

Tân Cymreig - Anuerin Donald (Born in Swansea); Imad Wasim (born in Swansea); Phil Salt (born in Bodelwyddan); David Lloyd (born in St Asaph's); Michael Hogan (played a decade for Glamorgan)

Bristol Bulldogs - James Bracey (born in Bristol); Jack Leaning (born in Bristol); Chris Dent (born in Bristol); Craig & Jamie Overton (born in Devon)

So draft order is as follows:
